attributes.action: help us take our petition to Brussels where the suits there can create a law enforcing MattWednesdays.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MattWednesday is a day set aside in the working week where Matt and his chums do very little work.  Any day of the working week can be designated a MattWednesday and no prior notice need be given. There need not be a Matt in a MattWednesday work group, and MattWednesdays are not allowed to fall on sick days, paid holidays or a bank holiday.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
